string.text: Start talking, buddy.
I'm all ears, buddy.
Well, hello!
Quit waving that thing about!
Get that thing out of my face!
You think you're hard or something? Holster that shooter!
If you want to go back in one piece, put that piece away!
Look! I'm going to pull mine out too!
Don't be threatening us with that heater! We got enough of our own!
Go, find someone else to annoy, buddy.
I ain't feeling talkative right now.
Beat it!
What the hell is wrong with you?
Less yapping, more shooting!
You picked a good time to talk...
Speak to the big bad boss.
I don't get paid to listen to your shit. The boss does.
If you need something, the boss is over there.
I ain't talking to you when you got that thing in my face!
Put that shooter away, then we'll talk.
Holster that shooter or get lost!
What's new?
Hail and well met!
Time's money. Get talking!
Holster that weapon, friend.
Holster your weapon.
Put that weapon away, chief.
Get that weapon holstered man.
Put that gun away now!
Put that weapon away, man!
Do you need any help getting rid of that weapon?
Dude... Put that shooter away.
Nah, I don't feel like talking.
Sorry, but I'm not in the mood to chat.
I can't talk right now.
We'll talk another time.
Later. We'll talk later.
This is a bad time to yap.
Speak to the squad commander if you want something.
Stalker, direct your questions to the commander.
Go see the commander.
We can chat when that weapon is not in my face.
Either put that shooter away, or just go away!
We'll talk when you holster your weapon.
Did you forget how to holster a weapon?
We ain't gonna have a conversation like this.
If you don't holster your weapon, it will be the only thing you can talk to!
Well, spill it!
I'm listening, man.
What's up, bro?
Don't play the hero. Keep that shooter holstered.
Holster your shooter, damn it!
Peace out, man! Holster that cannon of yours.
Don't you pull anything. And hide that shooter, will ya?
That's enough! Stop waving that piece around.
Hide your toy now!
Holster that friggin' shooter.
Scram!
This conversation ain't happening, and that's the end of it!
I can't be bothered to chat now.
Dude, you're crazy!
There's like, shooting and stuff, you know?
It's hardly the time to talk.
Go, talk to the boss, man!
I doubt I can tell you anything useful. Go, see the chief.
Leave me alone, man. Speak to the boss, he's over there.
You planning to shoot or talk? Holster that weapon!
I ain't keen on talking to people who are pointing a gun at me.
We'll talk once that shooter is holstered.
Are you here to shoot - or to talk?
Dude - your metal persuasion, it's gotta go!
Are you using that big toy to compensate for something?
Howdy?
What do you want?
Well? I'm listening...
Lower your weapon.
Put your weapon away!
Holster your weapon.
I ain't got the time to talk.
I can't help you.
Leave me alone, major.
We'll talk when the fight is over.
Quit this chatter and focus!
Not a good time to talk, man.
Go, see the commander.
The commander can answer your questions.
I do shooting. The commander does Q&A sessions.
If you want to talk, holster your weapon.
I ain't talking with you pointing that thing at me.
Holster your weapon if you want to talk.
Howdy-ho?
Hey, bro!
I'm listening...
Put your weapon away, man.
Quit screwing around! Holster your weapon!
Come on, man, put that weapon away!
I'm not talking to you.
I don't feel like chatting with you.
I ain't in the mood for gum beating.
This ain't the time to yap, man.
Are you crazy? We'll talk after!
Sure you want to chit-chat with all this shit going on?
Talk to the boss if you need something...
Speak to the boss.
The boss is over there. Go, talk to him.
Put that shooter away and then we'll talk.
I'm not really talkative when there's a gun being waved in my face. Shocking, eh?
I don't feel like talking when you've got me in your sights.
Come on man! Put that weapon away.
